post:
Dear Friends,

Only 3 months after acquiring VikingLayer we are happy to announce new VPS lineup in Sweden. Servers are hosted on dual X5675 CPUs and Hardware RAID 10 disk array accelerated with battery protected DDR Cache.
We use Portlane - Nacka Station as POP in Stockholm. Server is connected to AS42708.

Datacenter info:
Location: Stockholm - Sweden
Provider: Portlane
ASN: AS42708
Test IPv4: 192.71.144.14
Test IPv6: 2a00:1a28:155d:7265:0000:0000:0000:0001
